ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh!  Watch it be something they have tried to justify as useful... like Melanie s Melifluous Motion :oP Tigert says, This Wyrm won t get off of me!  I need a
ygData.messageBody:
Heh! Watch it be something they have tried to justify as useful... like
Melanie's Melifluous Motion :oP

Tigert says, "This Wyrm won't get off of me! I need a heal!"
Barrd says, "Cleric is dead! RUN!"
Tigert tries to flee but gets the living bejeezus beaten out of him.
Barrd says, "Wait! I can use my helmet's proc to teleprot you away!)
Barrd begins to cast a spell.
Tigert teleports an amazing 5 feet to the right.
Wyrm_01 uses VI's nifty "MOB teleports to PC's location if they can't get to
them" ability.
Tigert dies.
Barrd dies.
Wyrm_01 has a grand feast.

Yep, Brad was right, that's reeeeeeeeal handy.

-=B=-

----- Original Message -----
From: Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2000 10:04 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces


>
> --- Kyle Sibbald <ksibbald@...> wrote:
> >If the quest for the cake turns out to be quite
> > elaborate and time
> > consuming then I can see Verant putting this as the
> > reward.
> >
> > But what would be the effect?
>
> Hmmmm....immunity to being stunned?
>
> nah...
